definition: seething discontent (idiom); popular grievances boil over
to soar/to gallop/to prance/to turn over/to vacate/to clear

sentences.english: and at a time of popular insurrections in all sorts of countries.
sentences.chinese: 在那個年代，歐洲各國都民怨沸騰，起義不止。

sentences.english: The people are boiling with resentment over the officials embezzlement.
sentences.chinese: 這個官員的貪污罪行造成民怨沸騰。
